item.title: Prepare for a Mission
item.description:
Prepare for a Mission by undefined R. LaVell Edwards, Head Football Coach, Brigham Young University given in Saturday Evening of 154th Semiannual General Conference on Sun Sep 30 1984
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
item.itunes:author: undefined R. LaVell Edwards, Head Football Coach, Brigham Young University
